subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The Olympic organizing committee bidding for the 2016 Summer Games for Chicago named two new executives to top-level posts. Chicago 2016 named the insurance executive David Bolger as its new chief operating officer and Rick Ludwig, who has worked with several other Olympic organizing committees, as chief financial officer.
